#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main()
{	
	int t;
	cin >> t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,l,r;
		cin >> n;
		
		int *A = new int[n+1];
		int *B = new int[n+1];
		
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			cin >> A[i];
			B[i] = -1;
		}
		
		int min=n+2,x=n+2;
		int s = 0;
		B[0]=0;
		for(int i=1;i<=n;i++)
		{
			s += A[i];
			s %= n;
 
		//	if(B[s]==-1 && s==0)
			//	x=i+1;
			if(B[s]!=-1)
				x=i-B[s];
			
			if(x<min)
			{
				min = x;
				l=B[s];
				r=i-1;
			}
			
			B[s] = i;
		}
		
		cout << l << " " << r << endl;
	}
}
